title: Love Island's Ovie Soko and India Reynolds 'split' months after leaving villa
text:
India Reynolds and Ovie Soko ‘split’ months after leaving Love Island (Picture: Getty / Rex)

Love Island’s Ovie Soko and India Reynolds are the latest couple to ‘split’ after leaving the villa.

The pair, who came third on the ITV2 dating show, have reportedly called time on their relationship.

An insider claimed to MailOnline the reality stars came to an ‘amicable’ decision to go their separate ways, as their schedules became jam-packed following the show.

It has been months since they were last seen together, as the 28-year-old model skipped out on the basketball player’s recent ASOS collection launch.

And they were plagued by further split claims when India was accused of cheating on the 28-year-old with footballer ex-boyfriend Kieran Gibbs – something she fiercely denied.

However, the split may come as a shock, as Ovie recently boasted to Metro.co.uk about how well things were going between them.

Ovie previously praised his relationship with the model (Picture: W8 Media)

In an exclusive chat, he told us: ‘Me and India are really good. You know, everything is good, I really can’t complain…

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘India’s great man, she’s an absolute sweetheart. We’re absolutely fine, we’re happy.’

‘We’re moving and taking positive steps and trying as much as possible to just mind our business and get on with our relationship. But India’s she’s really good.’

He also revealed the cheating reports were ‘tough’ on his rumoured ex, adding: ‘It’s been really tough for her just because I don’t think it’s ever nice to say mean things to anyone, regardless of if you think it’s in defence of someone.

India was accused of cheating on Ovie (Picture: Splash)

‘And a lot of time comments come from a place of care, but we are all people at the end of the day, we’re all humans…

‘But India’s great.’

India and Ovie first met on Love Island 2019, and became firm fan favourites instantly.

The pair sailed into the final, where they were beaten to the crown by Amber Gill and Greg O’Shea.

But they’re not the only couple to call it quits, as Amber and Greg split just weeks after winning the show, while Belle Hassan and Anton Danyluk are also no longer an item.

Metro.co.uk has contacted reps for Ovie and India for a comment.

description: Love Island’s Ovie Soko and India Reynolds are the latest couple to ‘split’ after leaving the villa.
